name: FRE Chardonnay White Wine, Alcohol-Removed, 750mL Wine Bottle
short_description: Non-alcoholic white wine with creamy apple flavors and crisp citrus notes
This alcohol-removed wine has tropical fruit aromas and a tart finish
Pair this non-alcoholic Chardonnay white wine with fish, chicken, pork, white sauce pastas and mild cheeses
Made with grapes harvested from California's finest cool-climate vineyards
State-of-the-art spinning cone technology removes the alcohol in the wine while safeguarding its delicate aromas and flavors
product_description: With its deep golden hue, FRE Alcohol-Removed Chardonnay Wine makes any occasion special. Tropical fruit comes from each glass of this non-alcoholic wine. Rich, creamy apple flavors mingle with crisp citrus notes on the palate, concluding with an enjoyable tart finish. Open this alcohol-removed wine to pair with seafood, creamy pastas, salads or mild cheeses. Grapes come from California's finest marine influenced vineyards to develop rich flavors and complexity. Once crafted, the white wine goes through state-of-the-art spinning cone technology to remove the alcohol while safeguarding the fragile wine aromas and flavors. This bottled wine has less than 0.5% alcohol by volume and half the calories of regular wine.

name: Scandi Brut | Non-alcoholic wine | Non alcoholic champagne | Sparkling non alcoholic wine - good for alcohol free cocktails | good for mimosa and other cocktails
short_description: 0.0% Alcohol – Enjoy the Celebration Without the Buzz A sophisticated alcohol-removed sparkling wine, perfect for mindful drinkers or anyone seeking a festive, guilt-free option.
Scandi alcohol free wine has elegant Flavor Profile with Fine Bubbles Tasting notes of yellow fruits like mirabelle plum and pear, complemented by hints of brioche and toast — delicate and complex.
Smooth & Creamy Texture – A refined zero alcohol wine with a silky mouthfeel and crisp finish. Perfect as an aperitif and ideal for celebrations, brunches, and elegant gatherings.
Versatile Food Pairings Excellent with seafood, canapés, fresh salads, or fruity desserts — this alcohol free champagne is a perfect match for brunches, dinners, or celebrations.
Premium 750ml champagne bottle Format Ideal for sharing, gifting, or enjoying on a special night — the classic sparkling wine experience, without the alcohol. Perefect for non alcoholic cocktails.

name: Buzzkill Wines Non-Alcoholic Sauvignon Blanc, Dealcoholized California Dry White Wine, Gluten Free, Low Sugar, 40 Calories, Pack of 4 (8.4 fl. oz per can) 33.8 Fl Oz
short_description: NON-ALCOHOLIC SAUVIGNON BLANC: Made from California grapes by our renowned in-house winemaker, Buzzkill Sauvignon Blanc is an alcohol-removed still wine with classic Sauvignon Blanc aromatics of lemongrass, tropical notes of passionfruit, citrus undertones, and big Buzzkill vibes. Expect a wine that’s juicy on the palate with vibrant acidity and thirst-quenching properties. The perfect wine for traditional wine lovers, sober-curious, or totally dry wine lovers.

TASTING NOTES: Classic Sauvignon Blanc aromatics of lemongrass, tropical notes of passionfruit, and citrus undertones. Juicy on the palette with vibrant acidity and thirst-quenching properties. This year-round white wine pairs well with any pasta, chicken, or fish entree.

CLEAN INGREDIENTS: Buzzkill is made with all-natural ingredients. This dry non-alcoholic white wine is gluten-free, 70 calories, and has only 4g of sugar per can. Perfect for anyone following 75 Hard or a Keto lifestyle.

WHY BUZZKILL: Our customers are our best advocates, saying Buzzkill is “…absolutely delicious…super complex…definitely the best NA wine I’ve ever tried.” We’re excited to provide wine-lovers with a non-alcoholic option.

CLEAN LABEL: Made with natural ingredients, and wellness in mind, our non alcoholic wine checks off all the dietary boxes. This crisp beverage is gluten free, keto-friendly, 40 calories and 3g of sugar per serving.

name: Woody's Sparkling Rosé Non-Alcoholic Wine (750ml) | Alcohol-Free Wine Made from 100% Certified Organic California Grapes | Low Sugar, Gluten Free, Vegan
short_description: SOPHISTICATED NONALCOHOLIC SPARKLING ROSÉ: Indulge in the elegance of Woody's Sparkling Rosé, a nonalcoholic delight crafted from California's finest Chardonnay. Gently dealcoholized and infused with natural flavors, this rosé offers a refined taste with a touch of sweetness—perfect for celebrations, brunches, or simply savoring a moment of luxury.

VEGAN & GLUTEN-FREE WITH PURE INGREDIENTS: Woody's Sparkling Rosé is thoughtfully crafted to fit your lifestyle. Free from gluten, dairy, and grains, and made with plant-based, non-GMO ingredients, this beverage is not only delicious but also aligns with your health-conscious choices. Sip confidently knowing it’s vegan, vegetarian, and Halal certified.

ETHICAL & LOCALLY SOURCED: Enjoy a glass of Woody's knowing it supports ethical practices. Our Sparkling Rosé is fair trade and made from locally sourced Chardonnay grapes, reflecting our commitment to quality and sustainability. Every bottle is crafted with care, making it a choice you can feel good about.

LOW SUGAR & SODIUM-FREE: Savor the refreshing taste of Woody's Sparkling Rosé without the worry. With low sugar content, zero sodium, and no artificial sweeteners or preservatives, it’s a healthier option that doesn’t compromise on flavor. Ideal for those mindful of their dietary intake while still enjoying a sparkling experience.

SHELF-STABLE & PERFECT FOR ANY OCCASION: Woody's Sparkling Rosé is designed for convenience and longevity. With a shelf life of 12–24 months, it’s ready whenever you are. Whether you're hosting a dinner, toasting a special moment, or simply enjoying a quiet evening, Woody's offers a sophisticated, alcohol-free option that’s always ready to impress.

name: Thomson & Scott Noughty Blanc, Non Alcoholic White Wine, Dry, Citrus, Yellow Apple, Honeysuckle, Jasmine, Medium Acidity, Organic, Dealcoholized Chenin Blanc & Chardonnay, <0.5% ABV, 750ml 1 Bottle
short_description: NON-ALCOHOLIC | Sip and savor a refreshing alcohol-free Blanc to experience an authentic wine with less than 0.5% alcohol by volume. Our na wine goes through 14 days of fermentation, handled to prevent oxidation and lock in fruitiness, and left on lees for 2 months to add complexity. The wine is then dealcoholized by gently spun cone technology, under vacuum and at low temperature to ensure that it retains its distinctive body, color and flavor.

FLAVOR & FINISH | Notes of yellow apple, lime, melon and chamomile are predominant on the nose, with aromas of honeysuckle, citrus fruit and jasmine on the palate. Good balance of acidity and fruitiness. Medium flavor, body, and acidity, dry, low tannin with every sip.
PAIRS WELL | Versatile still Blanc de Blanc pairs well with fresh seafood, soft cheeses, and spicy dishes. Enjoy Noughty white with Thai, Mediterranean, creamy pasta, and grilled fish.

EVERYDAY & OCCASIONS | Noughty Blanc is perfect for backyard grill outs with friends, celebrations with family, or any occasion for those wanting a healthier drinking option with a upscale experience.

ORIGIN | 45% Chardonnay and 55% Chenin Blanc from vineyards in Western Cape, South Africa. Low carb with only 3.1 grams of sugar and 25 calories per 148ml glass. Made with vegan-friendly ingredients, this still Blanc is crafted without animal products or by-products, ensuring it's both ethical and cruelty-free.

name: Wander + Found Non-Alcoholic Wine, Pinot Noir, Award Winning Red Wine from Germany, Non-GMO Dealcoholized Wine, 750 ml (1 Bottle)
short_description: Discover Excellence: Try Wander + Found's award-winning Pinot Noir, a sophisticated red blend created in the style of a Spätburgunder - more commonly known to us as a Pinot Noir.

Award-Winning Excellence: Our non-alcoholic Pinot Noir has been recognized with a Silver Medal at the prestigious PR%F AWARDS, showcasing its exceptional quality, and a Bronze Medal at the World Dealcoholized Awards for its delightful flavors and craftsmanship.

Rich and Well-Balanced: Indulge in notes of ripened dark fruits, balanced with earthen richness and dried currants. This non-alcoholic wine offers a sought-after tannin structure and a complex, long finish.
Perfect Pairing: Whether it's a hearty steak, grilled fish, or a medley of vegetables, this Pinot Noir is the ideal companion for a perfect dinner.

Unwind and Enjoy: Enjoy a glass to relax and unwind, savoring the intricate flavors of Wander + Found Pinot Noir. Create memorable moments as you share a glass with loved ones, perfect for birthdays, family gatherings, and celebrations.

short_description: Rich, creamy apple flavors mingle with crisp citrus notes on the palate, leading to an enjoyably tart finish. - Percentage Alcohol: Less than 0.5%
Calories: 70 (less than half the calories of soda and traditional wine)
Carbohydrates: 19g
Percentage Juice: 23%
Includes a ChromaCast Pop Socket, Seasonal Wine Pairings & Recipes
product_description: With its deep golden hue, and lively tropical fruit aromas, this alcohol-removed Chardonnay is elegance personified. Rich, creamy apple flavors mingle with crisp citrus notes on the palate, leading to an enjoyably tart finish. Fre selects the fruit for their alcohol-removed Chardonnay from California's finest marine-influenced vineyards, where cool breezes and fog allow the grapes to ripen slowly and evenly as they develop rich flavors and complexity. Their winemakers carefully craft this Chardonnay using traditional methods; then their exclusive spinning cone process gently removes the alcohol while preserving the wine's delicate aromas and flavors.
